summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of South Holly Street from OAinier Ave. South to Seward Park Ave. South; and certain other streets, avenues and alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 18121 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement by made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of installment notes.
